properties.displayName: Potential DLL Sideloading Of Libcurl.DLL Via GUP.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\libcurl.dll" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\gup.exe") and (not(InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\Notepad++\\updater\\GUP.exe"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "libcurl.dll" by the "gup.exe" process from an uncommon location
